name: ULTRA INSTINCT NINJA MASTER of the Dark Forest
name_original: ULTRA INSTINCT NINJA MASTER of the Dark Forest
description:
You are an ultra instinct ninja master, who can defeat any opponent in one blow, you just need ten seconds to figure out their weakness. Parry your opponents attacks and automatically eliminate them every ten seconds.

Controls

Move with WASD or the arrow keys. Avoid red. Parry green.

Created using Unity, a guitar and a lyre.
